video.title: Being Human (U.S.)
video.synopsis: Boston roommates Aidan, Josh and Sally are your average twenty-somethings -- except that they're also a vampire, werewolf and ghost, respectively.

episodes.synopsis: Aidan gives in to his instincts; Josh faces his sister; Sally is ecstatic to have roommates who can see and hear her.
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A surprise guest wreaks havoc on Aidan's life; Josh faces a familial dilemma; Danny tells the story of how Sally died.
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Aidan is confronted by a different kind of ghost and Josh is haunted by the normal life he could have had; Sally makes a friend.
episodes.title: Some Thing to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: Josh makes an unexpected friend; Aidan tries to help Rebecca; Sally makes peace with Bridget and Danny.
episodes.title: Wouldn't It Be Nice (If We Were Human)

episodes.synopsis: Josh's relationship with Ray comes to a head; Aidan finds a vampire in the hospital; Sally discovers the horrifying truth about her death.
episodes.title: The End of the World as We Knew It

episodes.synopsis: Marcus exacts revenge in the worst way; Aidan and Rebecca get close; Sally meets a ghost with a dark side.
episodes.title: It Takes Two to Make a Thing Go Wrong

episodes.synopsis: Josh's family reunion is a disaster; Aidan fights for his friends' safety; Sally loses Bridget to Danny.
episodes.title: I See Your True Colors... And That's Why I Hate You

episodes.synopsis: Aidan makes a new friend; Sally finds a place to ask for help; Josh lets the wolf out.
episodes.title: Children Shouldn't Play with Undead Things

episodes.synopsis: Aidan watches Bernie die twice; Sally re-connects with an old acquaintance; Josh takes the next step with Nora.
episodes.title: I Want You Back (from the Dead)

episodes.synopsis: The vampire elders arrive; Josh is kidnapped; Aidan has to sacrifice to save his friend.
episodes.title: Dog Eat Dog

episodes.synopsis: Aidan has to choose sides; Josh gets a big surprise; Sally faces off with an exorcist.
episodes.title: Going Dutch

episodes.synopsis: Aidan runs into an old friend; Josh and Nora get some good news; Sally's door appears.
episodes.title: You're the One that I Haunt

episodes.synopsis: Aidan and Bishop square off; Nora finds out the truth about Josh; Sally's able to touch.
episodes.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Me Killing You

episodes.synopsis: Aidan deals with the power vacuum and orphan vampires left behind when Bishop died and Josh prepares to reenter medical school.
episodes.title: Turn This Mother Out

episodes.synopsis: Josh deals with the discovery that Nora's been turned into a wolf, Aidan helps Suren take control of Boston and Sally discovers new ghost powers.
episodes.title: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me?

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Nora prepare for their second change together, Sally explores reincarnation, and Aidan dates a human while cut off from his blood supply.
episodes.title: All Out of Blood

episodes.synopsis: Aidan struggles against falling back into his old lifestyle and Josh meets a brother and sister werewolf who may want the same thing he does.
episodes.title: (I Loathe You) For Sentimental Reasons

episodes.synopsis: Sally gets addicted to possessing a live woman and Aidan is called to task for not yet ridding Boston of the orphan vampires.
episodes.title: Addicted to Love

episodes.synopsis: Sally reconnects with her mom's ghost, Josh tries to protect Nora from the cops investigating Will's murder and Aidan's past comes back to haunt him.
episodes.title: Mama Said There'd be Decades Like This

episodes.synopsis: Sally learns who has been haunting her, Josh tries to reconcile with Nora, Aidan is targeted by the twins.
episodes.title: The Ties That Blind

episodes.synopsis: The Reaper offers Sally a job, Josh and Julia face their past, and Aidan and Suren get rid of Boston's fringe vampires once and for all.
episodes.title: I've Got You Under Your Skin

episodes.synopsis: Sally learns more about the Reaper, an old friend pays Josh a visit, and Aidan does whatever it takes to save Henry's life.
episodes.title: When I Think About You, I Shred Myself

episodes.synopsis: The Reaper fights for control of Sally, locking her in a dream world and Aidan and Josh in the house with Zoe, making everyone fight for their life.
episodes.title: Dream Reaper

episodes.synopsis: Aidan and Suren plan for their future together, Josh must choose between Julia and Nora, and Sally tries to fix one of the lives that she ruined.
episodes.title: Don't Fear The Scott

episodes.synopsis: Sally tries to convince Zoe not to turn her back on her gift and Aidan tries to make a life for himself and Suren.
episodes.title: Partial Eclipse of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Josh decides to kill Ray, Sally's mother returns, and Aidan decides to kill Mother.
episodes.title: It's My Party and I'll Die If I Want to

episodes.synopsis: Aidan resurfaces from being grounded and finds the vampire community vastly changed; ghost Sally fights to return from limbo; Josh and Nora face Ray.
episodes.title: It's a Shame About Ray

episodes.synopsis: Sally flirts with Trent, an old acquaintance; Aidan searches for blood and reunites with someone from his past; Nora meets a foe intent on revenge.
episodes.title: (Dead) Girls Just Wanna Have Fun

episodes.synopsis: Nora and Josh meet a teen runaway and debate how to handle the situation; Aidan and Henry search for clean blood in post-plague Boston.
episodes.title: The Teens They Are A-Changin'

episodes.synopsis: Sally reaches out to Aidan as his struggle to survive becomes direr; Josh and Erin accompany Nora when she visits her family.
episodes.title: I'm So Lonesome I Could Die

episodes.synopsis: Liam tries to pit Josh and Nora against Aidan; Sally gets closer with Max at the funeral home; and Kenny suspects that Aidan may be a vampire.
episodes.title: Get Outta My Dreams, Get Into My Mouth

episodes.synopsis: After an accidental encounter with someone from her past, Sally flees to Donna to try to make things right; Josh struggles with "raising" Erin.
episodes.title: What's Blood Got to Do with It?

episodes.synopsis: Josh reconnects with Emily; Aidan's clean blood supply is jeopardized when a sexy vampire makes Kenny an offer he can't refuse.
episodes.title: One Is Silver and the Other Pagan

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Nora's newfound bliss is short lived when Liam returns with an agenda for Aidan; Sally tries to figure out what's wrong with her body.
episodes.title: Your Body Is a Condemned Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Aidan remembers his wife as he gets sicker; Sally struggles with a hunger that she hasn't felt before; Josh and Nora meet an older wolf.
episodes.title: Of Mice and Wolfmen

episodes.synopsis: Josh learns that Aidan made a sacrifice to protect him and Nora; Aidan's date with Kat causes him to remember his wife and son.
episodes.title: For Those About to Rot

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Nora's search for Donna continues while Sally deteriorates; Aidan breaks Kenny out of the hospital to enjoy his final days as a human.
episodes.title: If I Only Had Raw Brain

episodes.synopsis: Sally prepares to battle Donna; Josh and Nora plan for their wedding; Aidan juggles his relationship with Kat while preparing for Kenny's "rebirth."
episodes.title: Always a Bridesmaid, Never Alive

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Nora face Liam for the final time; Sally deals with the consequences of her showdown with Donna; Aidan must deal with Kenny.
episodes.title: Ruh-Roh!

episodes.synopsis: With Josh trapped inside his wolf, Nora and Aidan struggle to contain him; while Sally is imprisoned with Donna, she learns they share a magic power.
episodes.title: Old Dog, New Tricks

episodes.synopsis: Aidan and Kat's relationship moves forward, but someone from Aidan's past threatens to derail it; Sally uses her powers to help Nora try to free Josh.
episodes.title: That Time of the Month

episodes.synopsis: Aidan learns there is a new vampire boss in town; Josh tries to return to his old life; Sally's new powers send her to a strange place in time.
episodes.title: Lil' Smokie

episodes.synopsis: Aidan and Kat's human relationship grows; Josh and Nora glimpse their future; Sally tries to solve the mystery of the girl she calls "Lil' Smokie."
episodes.title: The Panic Womb

episodes.synopsis: Aidan and Kenny go drinking to drown Aidan's pain; Josh and Nora throw a baby shower for their new wolf friends; Sally jumps around in time.
episodes.title: Pack It Up, Pack It In

episodes.synopsis: Josh awakes to a life-shattering discovery; Suzanna triggers Aidan'a memories of the past; someone from Sally's past returns with life-changing news.
episodes.title: Cheater of the Pack

episodes.synopsis: Donna gives Sally overwhelming information; Aidan and Suzanna face the truth about their past; Josh and Nora seek help from an old friend.
episodes.title: Gallows Humor

episodes.synopsis: After using magic and getting stuck in the past, Sally learns that she can possess herself -- and that trying to change the past brings consequences.
episodes.title: Rewind, Rewind..

episodes.synopsis: Still stuck in the past, Sally tries to correct her errors and realizes that the remedy lies with an old foe she must visit in the present.
episodes.title: Too Far, Fast-Forward!

episodes.synopsis: Trying to ingratiate himself to Nora, Josh gets sucked deeper into the world of wolves; Aidan and Sally's friendship turns into something more.
episodes.title: Oh Don't You Die for Me

episodes.synopsis: Aidan grieves and helps Kenny plan to get out of town; Sally and Nora help Josh conquer his wolf and deal with the little dead girl on Sally's mind.
episodes.title: Ramona the Pest

episodes.synopsis: As moving day arrives, the roommates discover a once-looming threat taking center stage and bringing with it a trail of death and destruction.
episodes.title: House Hunting

episodes.synopsis: Sally sacrifices to keep a murderous vision from coming true; Josh and Nora consider their future as parents; heartbreak descends upon the roommates.
episodes.title: There Goes The Neighborhood, Part III
